example: A loud grinding noise suggests worn bearings in the dryer

exampleMeaning: 定期润滑活动部件以减少噪音

example: The oven temperature is off; we need to calibrate its sensors
exampleMeaning: 烤箱温度不准；我们需要校准其传感器

example: Always troubleshoot step by step using the service manual
exampleMeaning: 务必按照维修手册逐步排查故障

example: Failure to power on and strange noises are common symptoms
exampleMeaning: 无法开机和异响是常见症状

example: Frayed wiring poses a serious fire hazard
exampleMeaning: 磨损的电线构成严重的火灾隐患

example: Intermittent power loss is usually a loose connection
exampleMeaning: 间歇性断电通常是接触不良

example: Ensure the ground wire is properly connected for safety
exampleMeaning: 为确保安全，请检查接地线是否连接妥当

exampleMeaning: 一条电路上电器过多会导致过载

example: Press the reset button after fixing the overload
exampleMeaning: 排除过载后按下复位按钮

example: Excessive vibration indicates an unbalanced load in the washer

example: Corrosion on battery terminals prevents good contact
exampleMeaning: 电池端子的腐蚀会导致接触不良

example: Static electricity can damage sensitive electronic components
exampleMeaning: 静电可能损坏敏感的电子元件

example: Check for cracked solder joints on the circuit board
exampleMeaning: 检查电路板上是否有焊接点开裂

example: Replace immediately if you find a frayed power cord

example: Faulty switches may produce sparks when toggled
exampleMeaning: 故障开关在切换时可能产生火花

example: Locate your home's circuit breaker panel

example: Test if the wall socket is live with a voltage tester

example: Never cut off the grounding pin on a three-prong plug
exampleMeaning: 切勿剪断三脚插头上的接地插脚

example: A damaged door gasket affects energy efficiency in ovens

example: Children usually want the window seat
